~~Let's find out if I can output plotly plots to Github-flavored .md files.~~ 

Nope. Let's do HTML instead.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Let's load maggrittr and plotly with `message` set to `FALSE`, to avoid all the 
annoying startup messages.

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(magrittr)
```

Now, let's have a look at the iris dataset:

```{r}
iris %>% 
    plot_ly(
        x = ~Sepal.Length, 
        y = ~ Sepal.Width, 
        color = ~Species,
        type = 'scatter',
        mode = 'markers'
            )
```
